markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Turtle Scale](/Equipment.aspx?ID=206)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 566 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 13 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're an expert in Athletics
</row>

</column>

---

This shimmering green scale is usually attached to a golden clasp or chain. When you activate the scale, for 1 minute you gain a swim Speed equal to half your land Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragon Turtle Scale
